text: The 1981 Audi British Open Championships was held at the Bromley Town Squash Club with the later stages being held at the Churchill Theatre, Bromley, Greater London from 30 March - 9 April 1981. Geoff Hunt won his eighth title defeating Jahangir Khan in the final. This eighth win set a new record surpassing the seven wins set by Hashim Khan of Pakistan. ==Seeds== ==Draw and results== ===Final=== Geoff Hunt beat Jahangir Khan 9-2 9-7 5-9 9-7 ===Section 1=== ===Section 2=== ==References== Category:Men's British Open Squash Championships Men's British Open Men's British Open Squash Championship Men's British Open Squash Category:Squash competitions in London Category:Sport in the London Borough of Bromley Men's British Open Squash Championship Men's British Open Squash Championship
title: 1981 Men's British Open Squash Championship
